name: Computer Science
description: Study of algorithms, programming, data structures, and software development. Covers theoretical foundations and practical applications of computing.

name: Software Engineering
description: Focus on designing, developing, and maintaining software systems using engineering principles and methodologies.

name: Information Technology
description: Managing and implementing technology solutions for businesses, including networks, databases, and cybersecurity.

name: Data Science
description: Analysis of complex data sets using statistical methods, machine learning, and computational techniques.

name: Cybersecurity
description: Protection of digital systems, networks, and data from cyber threats and unauthorized access.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Development of intelligent systems that can perform tasks requiring human-like intelligence and learning.

name: Business Administration
description: Learn management, finance, marketing, and organizational leadership to run successful businesses.

name: Economics
description: Study of economic theory, policy, market analysis, and resource allocation in society.

name: Accounting
description: Financial reporting, auditing, tax preparation, and financial analysis for organizations.

name: Finance
description: Management of money, investments, banking, and financial planning for individuals and organizations.

name: Marketing
description: Promotion of products and services through market research, advertising, and consumer behavior analysis.

name: International Business
description: Global business operations, international trade, and cross-cultural management practices.

name: Graphic Design
description: Visual communication through art, typography, digital media, and creative design solutions.

name: Fine Arts
description: Traditional artistic expression through painting, sculpture, drawing, and studio art practices.

name: Architecture
description: Design and planning of buildings, structures, and urban environments with aesthetic and functional considerations.

name: Digital Media
description: Creation and production of digital content including video, animation, and interactive media.

name: Film and Media Studies
description: Analysis and production of film, television, and digital media content and storytelling.

name: Music
description: Musical theory, composition, performance, and production across various genres and instruments.

name: Mathematics
description: Pure and applied mathematics, including algebra, calculus, statistics, and mathematical modeling.

name: Physics
description: Study of matter, energy, space, and time through theoretical and experimental physics.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemical processes, reactions, molecular structures, and laboratory analysis techniques.

name: Biology
description: Study of living organisms, ecosystems, genetics, and biological processes.

name: Environmental Science
description: Study of environmental systems, sustainability, and solutions to environmental challenges.

name: Statistics
description: Collection, analysis, interpretation, and presentation of data using statistical methods.

name: Medicine
description: Comprehensive medical training to become a physician, including diagnosis, treatment, and patient care.

name: Nursing
description: Patient care, health assessment, medical procedures, and healthcare support services.

name: Pharmacy
description: Medication management, drug development, pharmacology, and patient medication counseling.

name: Public Health
description: Population health, disease prevention, health policy, and community health promotion.

name: Dentistry
description: Oral health care, dental procedures, and treatment of dental and oral diseases.

name: Psychology
description: Study of human behavior, mental processes, and psychological assessment and therapy.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Design and construction of infrastructure including roads, bridges, buildings, and water systems.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Design and manufacturing of mechanical systems, machines, and thermal devices.

name: Electrical Engineering
description: Design and development of electrical systems, electronics, and power distribution.

name: Education
description: Teaching methodologies, curriculum development, and educational psychology for various levels.

name: Law
description: Legal principles, judicial processes, and preparation for legal practice and advocacy.
